title: resource not in expected location
body:
When running "spack install warpx", the resources that are downloaded are not put in the expected destinations. This is only a problem on the develop branch. In the master branch, this works correctly, and worked correctly in develop in the past.

The warpx/package.py file has the following specification:

```
    resource(name='amrex',
             git='https://github.com/AMReX-Codes/amrex.git',
             tag='master',
             destination='.')

    resource(name='picsar',
             git='https://bitbucket.org/berkeleylab/picsar.git',
             tag='master',
             destination='.')
```

Here are the relevant lines in the output:

```
==> Already staged resource-amrex-m2gvfqh7nrr4zo4yvuf6t6kzvovcg6ze in /Users/grote1/packages/spack-dpgrote/var/spack/stage/resource-amrex-m2gvfqh7nrr4zo4yvuf6t6kzvovcg6ze
==> Moving resource stage
	source : /Users/grote1/packages/spack-dpgrote/var/spack/stage/resource-amrex-m2gvfqh7nrr4zo4yvuf6t6kzvovcg6ze/src/
	destination : /Users/grote1/packages/spack-dpgrote/var/spack/stage/warpx-master-m2gvfqh7nrr4zo4yvuf6t6kzvovcg6ze/src/./src
==> Already staged resource-picsar-m2gvfqh7nrr4zo4yvuf6t6kzvovcg6ze in /Users/grote1/packages/spack-dpgrote/var/spack/stage/resource-picsar-m2gvfqh7nrr4zo4yvuf6t6kzvovcg6ze
```

The amrex source is put into src/src instead of amrex, and picsar is not copied at all.

### Information on your system

This happens on both mac and linux.
